text: Gei i lodo togohidu malama o di ngadau deelaa, gei ogo Ishmael tama daane a Nethaniah dela go tama daane a Elishama, tangada ni di madawaawa aamua o di king, guu hana gi Mizpah mono daane dilongoholu, ga heebagi gi Gedaliah ga daaligi a mee gii made. Mee gu daaligi labelaa nia daangada Israel mono gau o Babylon ala nogo i golo madalia a mee.
